Keywords: Cosmic , Deity , Hydra , Mystical , Past , Soldier , Warp World
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
SUPREME STRATEGIST: When Dormammu Red hits, give him a Plotting token. // Dormammu Red considers characters within X squares to be adjacent, where X is the number of his Plotting tokens.
PRIEST OF HELL: Leadership, Mastermind, Poison. When Dormammu Red uses Leadership and succeeds, you may also generate a Avengers Forever #003 Hydra Agent on click #1 or a Avengers Forever #007 Mindless Once on click #1. If a 6 was rolled, you may instead generate both.
DRAG YOU TO THE DARK DIMENSION: Invincible. // When Dormammu Red is hit by an attack, the attacker immediately gains Immobile until your next turn, even if this power is lost.
MY PERFECT PLAN, PERFECTLY EXECUTED: Outwit, Perplex. // When Dormammu Red hits with an attack, you may remove up to 3 Plotting tokens and increase the damage dealt this attack by the amount of Plotting tokens removed.
